Hamilton woman Christine Scott and the extravagant steps she took to avoid paying rent https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hamilton-woman-christine-scott-and-the-extravagant-lengths-she-went-to-not-to-pay-rent/QBQGQWKFGFDZPBQKLLKYBHRTPQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hamilton-woman-christine-scott-and-the-extravagant-lengths-she-went-to-not-to-pay-rent/QBQGQWKFGFDZPBQKLLKYBHRTPQ/ Belinda FeekAfter being arrested, Christine Scott carried out more offending.Fri, 17 Jan 2025 21:00:00 +0000 Christine Joy Scott, outside the Hamilton District Court today after sentencing, defrauded four different property rental companies tens of thousands in unpaid rent. Auckland fishers urged to stop lighting fires in regional parks after several blazes https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-fishers-urged-to-stop-lighting-fires-in-regional-parks-after-several-blazes/JDMILSPUXZELJM5JZHKWWW635E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-fishers-urged-to-stop-lighting-fires-in-regional-parks-after-several-blazes/JDMILSPUXZELJM5JZHKWWW635E/ Significant vegetation, planting areas have been lost at two regional parks due to fire. Bay of Plenty shearer Jamie Skiffington to attempt solo world record https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/bay-of-plenty-shearer-jamie-skiffington-to-attempt-solo-world-record/RZWI7CP4IRCRRD5CDBCQKEAWPY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/bay-of-plenty-shearer-jamie-skiffington-to-attempt-solo-world-record/RZWI7CP4IRCRRD5CDBCQKEAWPY/ Doug LaingThe current record is 872, set by Stu Connor in Cornwall in 2021.Fri, 17 Jan 2025 16:01:00 +0000 Jamie Skiffington will have to shear one lamb every 37 seconds to break the record.
